2) Mallet 
```{r}
topic.model_social_m2 <- MalletLDA(num.topics=35) # number of topics
topic.model_social_m2$setRandomSeed(12345L)

mallet.instances_social_m2 <- mallet.import(text.array=as.character(thesis.df_social_m2$cleaned_post),
                                  stoplist="stopwords.txt") 

topic.model_social_m2$loadDocuments(mallet.instances_social_m2) 

topic.model_social_m2$setAlphaOptimization(20, 50) # optimizing hyperparameters

vocabulary_social_m2 <- topic.model_social_m2$getVocabulary() # corpus dictionary
word.freqs_social_m2 <- mallet.word.freqs(topic.model_social_m2) # frequency table
```


```{r}
set.seed(123)
topic.model_social_m2$train(500)
topic.model_social_m2$maximize(10)
doc.topics_social_m2 <- mallet.doc.topics(topic.model_social_m2, smoothed=TRUE, normalized=TRUE)
topic.words_social_m2 <- mallet.topic.words(topic.model_social_m2, smoothed=TRUE, normalized=TRUE)
topic.labels_social_m2 <- mallet.topic.labels(topic.model_social_m2, topic.words_social, 10)

top.docs <- function(doc.topics, topic, docs, top.n=49) {
    head(docs[order(-doc.topics[,topic])], top.n)
}

#r9_m = as.data.frame(top.docs(doc.topics_social_m2, 9, thesis.df_social_m2$Дайджест.текста))
 
lapply(1:nrow(topic.words_social_m2), function(k) {
    top <- mallet.top.words(topic.model_social_m2, topic.words_social_m2[k,], 10) %>% select("term")
    cat(paste(k, top, "\n")) 
})
```

Visualization M
```{r}
library(dfrtopics)
library(ggplot2)

m_social_m2 <- mallet_model(doc_topics = doc.topics_social_m2, doc_ids = thesis.df_social_m2$id, vocab = 
vocabulary_social_m2, topic_words = topic.words_social_m2, model = topic.model_social_m2)
meta_social_m2 <- data.frame(id = thesis.df_social_m2$id, pubdate = as.Date(thesis.df_social_m2$Дата, "%d.%m.%Y"))
metadata(m_social_m2) <- meta_social_m2
series_social_m2 <- a(m_social_m2, 'days')
theme_update(strip.text=element_text(size=7), 
axis.text=element_text(size=7))

a(m_social_m2) %>%
plot_series(labels=topic_labels(m_social_m2, 2))

```

```{r}
install.packages('plotly')
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)


cols = rainbow(35, s=.6, v=.9)[sample(1:35,35)]

plot_social_m2 = ggplot(series_social_m2, aes(x=pubdate, y=weight, fill=as.character(topic)))
plot_social_m2 + 
  geom_area() +
  geom_area(alpha=0.6 , size=.2, colour="white") +
  theme_bw() + scale_fill_manual(values=cols)
  
save.mallet.state(topic.model = topic.model_social_m2, state.file = "D://mallet/social_m2_mallet_state.gz")
mallet.topic.model.write(topic.model = topic.model_social_m2, 'D://mallet/social_m2_mal.model')
```
